title: 游侠联机不了io.netty.channel.Abs trac tChanne l$AnnotatedConnec tException: C...
author: chen3395705122
txt_content:
io.netty.channel.Abs trac tChanne l$AnnotatedConnec tException: Connection refused: no further information:
游侠联机怎么办，怎么解决

replies.author: 名副其实
replies.txt_content: 请重启你的游戏或者游侠并且重进房间
